column4: emjay, i've been having very good results with the 64bit flash alpha
where did you get it from ?
http://labs.adobe.com/
http://labs.adobe.com/downloads/flashplayer10.html
where do i put the .so file ?
first,  in firefox, go to about:plugins
and check if you have a shockwave flash plugin registered
ok, then you will put the file in /home/emjay/.mozilla/plugins
where emjay is replaced with whatever your username is
odd i dont seem to have a plugins folder in .mozilla
thats ok, create one
i didn't either before this
now close and restart firefox
and check about:plugins for the plugin to be registerd
and test it out
about:plugins       File name: libflashplayer.so
cool, test it out
its odd mozilla will play youtube videos and on the test flash at adobe it works...but still says i need a plugin...so clicking install missing plugin says no plugin ...
interesting... it works great for me
sudo updatedb;locate libflash
your good then
i don't see how that would affect ff
